scripts.lintAndFormatAll: concurrently "yarn lintAndFormat" "cd src/renderer && yarn run check || true && yarn lint || true && yarn format && cd ../.."
scripts.lintAndFormatAllPrePush: yarn lint && yarn format && cd src/renderer && yarn run check && yarn lint && yarn format && cd ../..
scripts.run-2-agents: concurrently -p "[{time}] [{name}]" -n=sveltekit,electron -c=red,blue "yarn local-services" "electron-vite dev --watch -- --profile agent1 -b http://127.0.0.1:"$BOOTSTRAP_PORT" -s ws://127.0.0.1:"$SIGNAL_PORT"" "sleep 5 && electron-vite dev --watch -- --profile agent2 -b http://127.0.0.1:"$BOOTSTRAP_PORT" -s ws://127.0.0.1:"$SIGNAL_PORT"" "yarn run dev:sveltekit"
scripts.build: yarn test && yarn build:sveltekit && yarn typecheck && electron-vite build
scripts.rebuild-appstore-lib: yarn workspace appstore-tools build && rimraf ./node_modules ./src/renderer/node_modules && yarn cache clean && yarn install
scripts.setupForCI: cd rust-utils && yarn && yarn build && cd ..
scripts.build:libs: yarn workspace appstore-tools install && yarn workspace appstore-tools build && rimraf src/renderer/node_modules/.vite
scripts.fetch:default-apps: curl -L --fail --output resources/default-apps/kando.webhapp https://github.com/holochain-apps/kando/releases/download/v0.9.5/kando.webhapp && curl -L --fail --output resources/default-apps/devhub.happ https://drive.switch.ch/index.php/s/OSkIo8wWWrvlP39/download && curl -L --fail --output resources/default-apps/appstore.happ https://drive.switch.ch/index.php/s/ErATwmbm3m7LmWr/download
